description: This file defines the AuthService class that handles user authentication processes including login, registration, JWT token storage, logout, and providing authorization headers for API requests in a Flutter application.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: A service class managing authentication, including login, registration, JWT token storage, and retrieval.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Attempts to authenticate a user with email and password, storing the JWT token upon success.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new user with email and password.

methods.name: isAuthenticated
methods.description: Checks if the user has a stored JWT token indicating authentication.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Clears the stored JWT token, effectively logging the user out.

methods.name: getJwtToken
methods.description: Retrieves the stored JWT token from secure storage.

methods.name: _getJwtToken
methods.description: Fetches the JWT token from secure storage.

methods.name: getAuthHeader
methods.description: Provides headers with the Authorization Bearer token for authenticated API requests.
